meanings.definition: The quality or state of being scratchy.
meanings.sent1: The scratchiness of the fabric made it uncomfortable to wear.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't stand the scratchiness of the wool sweater against my skin.
meanings.sent3: The scratchiness of the cat's tongue tickled my hand as it licked me.
meanings.sent4: The scratchiness of the sandpaper reminded me of the rough texture of a tree bark.
meanings.sent5: The scratchiness of the old record added a nostalgic charm to the music.

meanings.definition: The sensation or sound of something rough or abrasive.
meanings.sent1: The scratchiness of the sandpaper against the wood was loud and grating.
meanings.sent2: I could hear the scratchiness of the gravel under my shoes as I walked.
meanings.sent3: The scratchiness of the broom against the floor made a rhythmic sweeping sound.
meanings.sent4: The scratchiness of the cat's purr was oddly soothing to listen to.
meanings.sent5: The scratchiness of the chalk on the blackboard made my skin crawl.
